opportunities.title: Jane Street Application Portal (AUS)
opportunities.description: Apply to Jane Street's full range of roles — internships, new grad positions, and experienced hires — through their dedicated Australian application portal. Rolling applications, apply any time.

opportunities.title: Summer Internship Program
opportunities.description: IMC Trading is offering internship positions for students interested in quantitative trading, software engineering, and market making. Join a global team of problem solvers using technology and algorithms to trade in financial markets worldwide.

opportunities.title: Women in Trading Program
opportunities.description: Jane Street's Women in Trading program is a unique opportunity for women interested in quantitative trading, programming, and mathematics. This cohort's applications are now closed — stay tuned for future rounds.
